Text: Yuri the astronaut and his nemesis Gregori? What is this Russian propaganda? Probably. Probably is.
A fucking awesome retro platformer. The soundtrack is one of the best i ever heard in an indie game. I guess i'll buy a copy later, for good measure.
This game reminds me of my childhood. AWESOME!

I Love it! It's so good that I had to buy a copy of it.
Just to be sure that I'll see other games from this guys!
http://studiominiboss.com/out-there-somewhere/
